website_summaries.verdict: For little animals, the shallow angle of steps offers a great feature. Customers like the lightweight design of steps.
pros: Soft steps allow pets to gain traction easily
Owners report great success with small dogs using these steps
Dogs figure out how to use these steps quickly
cons: Steps will slide on hard floors without use of area rug
Total step height comes up short for some tall beds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my aging dog who jumps off the bed ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my aging dog who jumps off the bed too often for her slipped disc. Of course, and perhaps it is obvious, but these steps are only useful if you are the kind of person who sleeps with her dog. Which I am.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bunger

customer_reviews.title: Foam Pet Stairs
customer_reviews.text: My little dog weighs six pounds. I enticed her up and down the steps a few times with treats and she had the hang of it. These steps have worked out wonderfully for us. The only thing I have had to do is place something on the floor in front of them so they don't move. I have hard wood floors and they slide a bit on the floor. I used some sand in a plastic bag inside a tube out of fabric. I highly recommend these steps and the company selling these steps was excellent to work with.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these --and it is so cool watching him climb the stairs -- not to mention ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these --and it is so cool watching him climb the stairs -- not to mention not having to get up to pick him up! He's seven & had no trouble figuring them out. You CAN teach old dogs new tricks!! 😀
customer_reviews.author: MargaretvBS

customer_reviews.title: The little dog hated the other stairs purchased in the past but LOVES ...
customer_reviews.text: The little dog hated the other stairs purchased in the past but LOVES these. Soft and foam much better than hard stairs. These stairs are great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Staris! loved them, but more important...my dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great Stairs! Perfect for my two maltese poodles to climb up on the bed. They were both a bit hesitant to climb the at first, but after a couple of hours, they got use to them.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Love these stairs!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog uses pet stairz for the couch and loves them! She is unable to jump up anymore on her own, so I thought I would try them out. I have a 5# chihuahua and the stairs are perfect for her size.
customer_reviews.author: Erin F

customer_reviews.title: Pet steps
customer_reviews.text: Great steps for my Maltese and artrithric cat to get on the couch. Sturdy, yet easy to move. Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Cross

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for what they are. Can be found much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't use them
customer_reviews.text: Our bed is high and our dogs sleep w/us. We bought these thinking we would save ours dogs legs from the impact from jumping down. They would go left or right, but never use the Petstairz 3 Step. Their bodies were too long for the depth of the treads. Instead we put an ottoman at the corner of the bed and they use that (a single step mid-height worked). I praise the company for a prompt refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Kane

customer_reviews.title: Pets Really Do Like These Quality Stairs
customer_reviews.text: These stairs are perfect and long lasting for our Chihuahuas! We have had all sizes for different applications for over 4 years. Although some pets may take a day or two to adapt to the new mode of elevating Chihuahuas and other small dog breeds will and do use these stairs by nature because they enjoy the ease of getting on and off beds, sofas, etc. with grater ease, verses jumping up and down. These are a life savor for breeds pronged to leg and knee stress and disabilities down the road. Additionally Pet Stairz brand steps are superior in quality over any other I have seen! Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Reed
